Resetting the password¶

  1. Go to Login with Moonbeam Envision account -> Forgot password

Figure 2.1¶

  1. When you receive an email (Figure 2.2) for a rumii account recovery, press the link and then fill out a new password for your account (Figure 2.3)

Figure 2.2¶

Figure 2.1¶

Moonbeam Envision
